title: Donut Time
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Honoka-chan. Here you go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wow, donuts! They look delicious! Thanks, Kanata-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re welcome. I’d love to hear what you think after you’ve tasted them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Of course, no problem! Don’t mind if I do~! Nom... Yum, this is so tasty~~! This has such a mochi-like, springy texture!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I put mochi into the batter. There was mochi left over from New Year’s, so I came up with some ways to use them in other recipes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I see. I never considered putting mochi into donuts. Kanata-san, you’re amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I’m gonna blush if you keep complimenting me like that~ I’m glad you like it, though. 𝅘𝅥𝅮 Seeing that you’re enjoying it so much is making me hungry for donuts too. Honoka-chan, why don’t we have some tea with our donuts?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Sure!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, let’s head to the club room. I brought some nice black tea the other day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright! Tea time with you is going to be awesome! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
